txt.en: Investigate crates of suspicious goods to collect old recipe scraps ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Old recipe scraps can be found in the ruins.\n\nCollect recipe scraps for Wingard Puddifoot.
Wingard Puddifoot needs help gathering ingredients.
Deliver old recipe scraps to Wingard Puddifoot
Wingard Puddifoot can be found just outside the ruins north of Gamwich.\n\nReturn to Wingard Puddifoot.
TBD 'Oh excellent, excellent! I cannot begin to properly explain how excited I am. There is nothing as lovely like new research material. You have my thanks.'

'A few days ago I asked the folks up in the ruins if I could poke around, and you know what they said? 'Be off before you regret it!' and they chased me away!

'I want you to investigate the ruins for any scrap of writing related to cookery. Check their supplies. Maybe they already gathered what we're looking for without knowing it.

'I will wait here where there are no ruffians.'
'New research material! You are a fine assistant indeed. Give me a moment to look through what you've brought me.'
